entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [wasm] `STJ.Serialization.Tests.JsonIgnoreAttribute_UnsupportedCollection` failing on `main` #71981
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink error handling #71970
  • Planned System.Text.Json contract customization improvements for .NET 8 #71967
    8.0.0
  • System.Text.Json default contract resolvers fail early on misconfigured attributes #71966
    8.0.0
  • Reconsider the semantics of `JsonProperty.ShouldSerialize` null values #71964
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.UnitTests.GeneratorTests failing with OutOfMemoryException on net7.0-windows-Release-x86-CoreCLR_checked-Windows.10.Amd64.Open #71962
  • The `JsonSerializerOptions.TypeInfoResolver` property should be nullable #71960
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] `JSImportExportTests.JSImportObjectArray` failing on `v8` with `ES6 module JavaScriptTestHelper was not imported yet, please call JSHost.Import() first.` #71952
    7.0.0
  • HardwareIntrinsics RunReflectionScenario_Load failing due to "Assertion failed 'tgtIG'" #71950
  • System.Text.Json serialization callbacks not supported by collection types #71945
    8.0.0
  • Add support for parameterized constructors in System.Text.Json contract customization #71944
    8.0.0
  • QUIC: Allocate MsQuicSafeHandle._traceId lazily #71935
    7.0.0
  • System.Text.Json fast path serialization not working with combined contexts #71933
    8.0.0
  • [crossgen2-composite gcstress] OSX x64 failures with "External disassembler is not available" #71931
  • [jitstress-isas-x86] Assertion failed 'compiler->compIsaSupportedDebugOnly(isa)' during 'Generate code' #71928
    7.0.0
  • QUIC: QuicStream.WaitForWriteCompletionAsync sometimes doesn't complete #71927
  • Http3Request SendAsync cancellation #71922
  • Much higher CPU Usage on Linux than on Windows #71921
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/shift/int64_r/int64_r.sh #71920
    7.0.0
  • Test failure readytorun\\tests\\fileversionpreservation\\fileversionpreservation\\fileversionpreservation.cmd #71919
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage/expl_double_1_r/expl_double_1_r.dll #71917
    7.0.0

Closed

  • System.Text.Json contract customization: not possible to enable deserialization in properties marked JsonIgnoreCondition.Always #71886
    7.0.0
  • .NET 7 regression in ZipArchive #68734
    7.0.0
  • Regressions from enabling reading PGO data #66998
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add another entry to JsonNumberHandling to serialize long/ulong as strings #71830
  • [API Proposal]: MetadataReader.GetAssemblyName(string assemblyFile) #63960
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] avoid eval, design better API for InvokeJS #61287
    7.0.0
  • Passing a path to a key that doesn't exist to OpenSubKey() causes a SafeRegistryHandle to be finalized #71773
  • Assert: ThreadBaseExceptionFilter_Worker called in no-throw context #68819
    7.0.0
  • MacOS Sandboxed Universal Binaries Bundle is crashing on M1 devices every second launch. #69010
    7.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\threading\\generics\\Monitor\\EnterExit12\\EnterExit12.cmd #71918
  • Assertion failed 'lclVarType != TYP_UNDEF' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #62251
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests/DblMul_d/DblMul_d.sh #62882
  • Make yml AzDO tasks more robust by leveraging the new task retry features #65258
  • "runtime-libraries enterprise-linux" jobs failing due to network issue #65621
  • .NET Core app - submission to Mac app store #64258
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_35821/GitHub_35821/GitHub_35821.sh #71915
    7.0.0
  • Add APIs to JSON Contract customization #71123
    7.0.0
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, runtime, .NET 6 MAUI, validation-runtime-.NET 6 MAUI #runtime-119866-.NET6MAUI #62388
  • Test failure readytorun/tests/mainv2/mainv2.sh #71241
    7.0.0
  • Intermittent hang/deadlock in .net core 5.0.400 while debugging #58471
    6.0.x
  • [source build] use of undeclared identifier 'kSecUseDataProtectionKeychain' #67846
  • JIT: More unsafe call args reordering in x86 #71939
    7.0.0
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69230
    7.0.0
  • .NET 7.0 BigInteger.GreatestCommonDivisor bug. #71641
    7.0.0
  • Generic Math - API tweaks #71648
    7.0.0
  • Add ICU App-Local tests #35930
    Future
  • Validator.TryValidateObject on JObject throws System.ArgumentException #64207
    7.0.0
  • [VS experience] Clean build in M.E.Logging fails perhaps due to timing issue but succeeds on second try #48711
    8.0.0
  • Very high CPU usage during NullReferenceException translation phase #61583
    7.0.0
  • looking for clrjit.dll source code if avaliable #71934
  • Source generated marshalling can leak unmanaged resources in the presence of exceptions #69529
    7.0.0
  • GRPC error after upgrading from .netcoreapp3.1 to .net5 or .net6 #71906
  • .net 7 likely to support HarmonyOS? #71930
  • [API Proposal]: Add Wrap and Unwrap methods to NegotiateAuthentication API #70909
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Requests.Tests failure in checked coreclr Linux x64 Release #71776
  • [wasm] fix SendAsync_GetWithInvalidHostHeader_ThrowsException - doesn't throw on WASM #53874
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Tests.MemorySendReceiveTest.SendReceive_Concurrent_Success test fails on CI #68359
    7.0.0
  • Add a PlatformIndependent tfm for System.Private.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript #46378
    7.0.0
  • WebAssembly: Aes.Create() throws System.PlatformNotSupportedException #42384
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Change the CSE heuristics cost #71982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Move v1 marshaller design to Ancillary.Interop #71980
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • [PERF][MAUI] Add Maui runs for net7.0 #71979
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Move ArrayMarshaller and PointerArrayMarshaller to the v2 design #71978
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator
  • Stop requiring bidirectional support for `MarshalMode.Default` #71977
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Fix some failing `System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript.Tests` #71976
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • ILASM - Allow EntryPoint methods to be on interfaces #71975
    area-ILTools-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add new `wasm-experimental` workload #71974
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Mark `Assembly.GetCallingAssembly` with `[RequiresDynamicCode]`. #71973
    area-System.Reflection, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • ILASM - Disable `fileversionpreservation` test #71972
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Override ReadAsync and WriteAsync methods on ConsoleStream. #71971
    area-System.Console
  • [QUIC] API QuicStream #71969
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • Add logic for selecting the right version of pgort140 #71968
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • add ValidationPolicy to ssl options #71961
    area-System.Net.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add test which reproduces but in complex framework resolution #71959
    test-enhancement, area-Host, 7.0.0
  • Use `-unicode` instead of `/unicode` for linux ildasm roundtrip tests #71958
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Remove android special case from eng/native/naming.props #71953
    area-Build-mono
  • Update wasm related README #71951
    community-contribution
  • Break apart source-build intermediate which exceeds AzDO size limit #71949
  • #65560 seperated test cases for caseinsensitive platforms #71948
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • [Android] Port getifaddrs implementation from Xamarin.Android #71943
    area-System.Net
  • Obsolete ServicePointManager #71942
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] Support network status information #71941
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation
  • fixes #71185 #71926
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Add markdown readme for System.Reflection.Metadata #71925
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • fixes #71295 #71924
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution

Merged

  • Disable SYSLIB1045 for System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests #71914
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add tests for OAEP encryption with non-power-of-two key sizes #71699
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • Fix contract customization being silently ignored over pre-existing JsonIgnoreCondition configuration #71908
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Allow ZipArchive to create duplicate entries #69524
    area-System.IO.Compression, 7.0.0
  • Make MetadataReader.GetAssemblyName(string assemblyFile) public #71801
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm] reduce eval in production code #71932
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Avoid SafeHandle finalization from failed registry operations #71854
    area-Microsoft.Win32
  • Fix BigInteger out-of-bound index during GCD calculation #71671
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix JitDoSsa=0 #71789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix the type check in `fgMorphMultiregStructArg` #71937
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Added the option to get the compiler version from Crossgen2 #67317
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Don't use Newtonsoft.Json as a test dependency name in ResolveComponentDependencies host test #71946
    test-enhancement, area-Host, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Fix reordering with 'backfilled' arguments on x86 #71940
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stop throwing when attempting to validate a JObject. #71717
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations
  • Update System.CommandLine from 2.0.0-beta3 to beta4 #71916
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Improve JsonSerializerContext error messages in combined contexts. #71936
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Consolidate Newtonsoft versions #71402
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • NegotiateAuthentication: Implement additional API surface #71777
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] closing invalid host header as would not fix #71923
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] fix Debug configuration compilation #71929
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Remove unused files from System.Net.Http.csproj #71912
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix ordering of adding in Regex's BitVector.GetHashCode #71913
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Updated

  • [wasm] Disable `S.T.RegularExpressions FunctionalTests` tests failing due to linker issues #71875
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix converting old SIMD ctors to HWI ones #71865
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: SafeFileHandle overloads for SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add reflection introspection support for function pointers #71516
    area-System.Reflection, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 7.0.0
  • createdump improvements for better VS4Mac Watson bucketing #71863
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Update DependencyGraphViewer to allow for DGML reading #70690
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Refactor Rfc2898DeriveBytes to support spans #71888
    area-System.Security
  • [wasm][aot] Make the gc pin area smaller. #71807
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm][aot] Avoid making the 'this' variable volatile. #71799
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Polyfill the incremental generator ForAttributeWithMetadataName from roslyn (for LibraryImportGenerator). #71652
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Re-create profile data on profile-use-only mode #71754
    area-TieredCompilation-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Moved call to TryLoadGenericMetaTypeNullability #71851
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT][MONO] Move marshal-ilgen into a component #71203
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add Kerberos loopback test #71824
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Ask SChannel for stapled OCSP when the client will do revocation #71570
    area-System.Net.Security, os-windows, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Various createdump fixes. Smaller MacOS dump size, better logging/stats, misc cleanup, etc. #71569
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Double to Decimal Conversion Refactor (WIP) #70602
    area-System.Numerics
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Provide upgrade response details #71757
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Removed JIT (uint) cast workaround to elide bound-checks in CoreLib #67448
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Initial implementation of the ILPROJ analyzer utility to assist the planned runtime test refactoring #60984
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [QUIC] API QuicConnection #71783
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic
  • ARM64 - Allow double constants to CSE more often #65176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Generalize init block morphing a little #70899
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Regression test for GitHub issue #71319 #71461
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Implement HTTP/2 WebSockets #70895
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Remove ThreadPool native implementation #71719
    area-System.Threading
  • Rebucket tests that fail with NativeAOT and fix some #71819
    area-System.Diagnostics
  • Implement the ContentLengthReadStream.Length property #71879
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 12.0.3 to 13.0.1 in /src/libraries/Common/tests/System/Net/Prerequisites/NetCoreServer #71180
    area-System.Net, community-contribution, .NET
  • Add support for building WASM variants alongside single-threaded to the build system #71054
    area-Build-mono
  • Add predefined cpu names for --instruction-set (e.g. haswell) #71911
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Always use live host #71725
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Search native code in all R2R images in version bubble #68607
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • emit branchless form of (i >= 0 && j >= 0)/(i!=0&& j!= 0) for signed integers #62689
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Bring over distributed transactions support for Windows #71433
    area-System.Transactions
  • Improve `CreateDirectory` on Windows #66754
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Fix `DataContractJsonSerializer`'s handling of -0.0 #69020
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Experiment light self contained test runner(no reflection/comm stack) #71305
    community-contribution
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add lowering support for conditional nodes #71705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add setter to TransactionManager.DefaultTimeout and MaxTimeout. #71703
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • NativeAOT: Do not disambiguate calli thunks based on modops #70105
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Temporarily exclude NativeAOT from source-build until we figure out how to handle it #71853
  • DCS alignment to 4.8 with schema support #71752
    area-Serialization, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Use Roslyn support for RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan #70179
    NO-MERGE, area-Meta, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
